java.lang.Object

com.example.omrifit.adapters.Rv_Adapter_for_user_item
public class Rv_Adapter_for_user_item extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<Rv_Adapter_for_user_item.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of user profile items.
